name: Rootstack
tagline: We bring companies to the next level.
description:
Rootstack is a digital agency comprised of an outstanding team of engineers who believe in hard work and always putting in maximum efforts to provide what’s being requested. With 10 years of experience, we have been able to harvest a pool of over 100 clients who have enjoyed the benefits of our methodologies and obtained a final product that was designed to fit their needs.  
What we do
We cover services ranging from custom software design, IT consulting, outsourcing (nearshore and onsite), quality assurance, design to managed services and everything in between. Our team is capable of adjusting to each request coming from our clients. 
How we do it
Our team focuses on always delivering the best final product through the use of best practices combined with the right tools, we are always looking for ways to innovate the way we work to make sure our solutions are stable, scalable and will withstand the test of time. 
We count on the latest open source technologies like Python, PHP, Javascript, etc. For frameworks and libraries Symfony, Drupal, Angular and React are a few of our favorites. 
READ MORE...
